#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>

using namespace std;

int a[100005];

int main()
{
    int n,q,x,y,k,idx;
    char s[102];
    scanf("%d%d", &n, &q);
    while ( q-- ) {
          scanf("%s", s);
          if ( s[0] == 'U' ) {
               scanf("%d%d", &x, &y);
               k = 2;
               idx = x;
               while ( idx <= n ) {
                     a[idx] += y;
                     idx = x*k;
                     k++;
               }
          }
          else {
               scanf("%d", &x);
               printf("%d\n", a[x]);
          }
    }                 
    return 0;
}
